reviewText: thanks I got this item and I am happy with it thanks again

I love the quality and price of these new collections. I have them all, and love them all. Even with as many compilations as they HAVE, I don't have any repeated episodes. I highly recomend them all... from Halloween, to Christmas, back to Heroes and Heroines, there IS a collection worthy of your shelf-space! Here's the other three NEW ones: TV Guide Spotlight: Very Special Episodes TV Guide Spotlight: Kid Stars TV Guide Spotlight: TV's Greatest Dads ______________________________________________________________ ______________________________________________________________ * There ARE a few things I didn't like about THIS, particular, collection though. There are NO problems with the seven [copyrighted] episodes, and the second [public domain] episode. However, I am VERY surprised that the 1958 "OZZIE and HARRIET" episode b-e-g-a-n with a c-l-o-s-i-n-g credits mentioning Kris Nelson [married Rick in 1963]. There's NO closing credits, and, the 16mm source print had two jump-splices. The picture actually ROLLED once. (Remember that?) * The PETTICOAT JUNCTION episode is, also, in the public domain, and suffers from video quality, and the opening/closing theme song has been replaced by some cheesy bluegrass music WITHOUT that familiar singing. Now, THAT sucked! ______________________________________________________________ ______________________________________________________________
